document.full_text: french finance minister christine lagarde said on tuesday that the size of the additional financial package for greece had not yet been worked out and that the package will not include the restructuring of greek debt.
document.title: lagarde says size of new greece bailout not decided
lines_and_colors: french finance minister christine lagarde said on tuesday that the size of the additional financial package for greece had not yet been worked out and that the package will not include the restructuring of greek debt.
